en.label: Security settings
en.title: Create your recovery phrase
en.paragraph: This will take a few minutes. Make sure no one is watching your screen and that you have a pen and paper or password manager ready.
en.what_is_phrase_a: Your recovery phrase contains your Internet Identity number and a secret 24-word phrase
en.how_save_phrase_q: How do I save my recovery phrase?
en.how_save_phrase_a_1: Save it in a password manager
en.how_save_phrase_a_2: Store in a safe deposit box
en.how_save_phrase_a_3: Write down and store in multiple secure places
en.when_use_phrase_q: When should I use my recovery phrase?
en.when_use_phrase_a_1: If you lose access to all your devices and have no other method for accessing your Internet Identity
en.share_phrase_q: Should I share my recovery phrase?
en.share_phrase_a_1: Never! If someone asks for your recovery phrase, they are likely trying to steal access to your accounts
